edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.trie

Class BinaryLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.trie.BinaryLoader

  • public class BinaryLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides utils to load NgramTrieModel from binary file created with sphinx_lm_convert. Routines should be called in certain order according to format:
    • verifyHeader
    • readCounts
    • readQuant
    • readUnigrams
    • readTrieByteArr
    • readWords

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryLoader(java.io.File location) 
      BinaryLoader(java.net.URL location)

      Reads weights quantation object from stream
      void readTrieByteArr(byte[] arr)
      Reads trie in form of byte array into provided array.
      NgramTrieModel.TrieUnigram[] readUnigrams(int count)
      Reads array of language model unigrams
      java.lang.String[] readWords(int unigramNum)

      void verifyHeader()

    • Method Detail

      • verifyHeader

        public void verifyHeader()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Reads header from stream and checks if it matches trie header
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading from stream failed

      • readCounts

        public int[] readCounts()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads language model order and ngram counts
        Returns:
        array of counts where ordinal number is ngram order
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading from stream failed

      • readQuant

        public NgramTrieQuant readQuant(int order)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads weights quantation object from stream
        Parameters:
        order - - max order of ngrams for this model
        Returns:
        quantation object, see NgramTrieQuant
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading from stream failed

      • readUnigrams

        public NgramTrieModel.TrieUnigram[] readUnigrams(int count)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads array of language model unigrams
        Parameters:
        count - - amount of unigrams according to counts previously read
        Returns:
        array of language model unigrams, see NgramTrieModel.TrieUnigram
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading from stream failed

      • readTrieByteArr

        public void readTrieByteArr(byte[] arr)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Reads trie in form of byte array into provided array. Size of byte array is computed from previously read language model specifications, see NgramTrie
        Parameters:
        arr - - byte array to read trie to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading from stream failed

      • readWords

        public java.lang.String[] readWords(int unigramNum)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads vocabulary of language model. Ordinal number of word stays for wordId.
        Parameters:
        unigramNum - - amount of unigrams
        Returns:
        array of strings - vocabulary of language model
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - of reading from stream failed

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Should be called when model reading finished
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if stream was corrupted
